column4: Can't anybody take a look at my problem??  I posted it http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=41533
I'm seriously out of ideas
when does that problem occur?
Anytime I try and play anything from Cedega
but it never happened till I installed Wine
even if I remove the packages for wine it still does it
did you try the command it suggests ("LANG=etc")
Is that in the /etc/enviroment file??  Is that what its refering to?
on my system I just use that command
but I'm not on Ubuntu right now, its worth a try!
ok so...what do I need to do to try this?
open a terminal, and type LANG=whatever
I just put LANG=en_US
It didn't return with anything...
see if its worked with "env|grep LANG"
yes that command checks out
has it helped?
nah same thing
have you tried running winex from the terminal
I run Point2Play from the terminal to see the error
ok i'm spent
If I don't run it from the terminal you don't see anything and nothing happens
lol.... It doesn't make any sense...everything on my system checks out
